3.5.1. Users and roles in Cortex AgentiX
In the Cortex AgentiX tenant, you can set permission levels for each role by going to Settings â†’ Configurations â†’ Access Management â†’ Roles and then editing or creating a new role
3.5.2.2. Manage roles in the Cortex AgentiX tenant
By default, Enable Scope Based Access Control is disabled in Settings â†’ Configurations â†’ General â†’ Server Settings, and granular scoping is not enforced

3.11.2.6. How to map authentication story events?
